descriptions: Created P1 issue creation platform from scratch
Handling the process of P1/P0 issue resolution for, all the customers, thus reducing the manual efforts,and timing of the users in India and USA
Handles all the complicated technicalities and process through a form based interface along with multiple configuration, maintaining history, filters which reduce the manual efforts
Automatic Jira ticket creation, war room, sending email
